mapper.sql: id, order_no, order_time, report_time, car_number, car_frame_number, car_model_number, car_ascription, car_owner, isdrive, order_status, order_type, take_car_contacts, take_car_contact_number, take_car_time, take_car_address, express_company, express_number, mailing_address_name, mailing_address_telephone, province, city, county, detailed_address, client_type, client_id, order_amount, payee_name, bank_account, opening_bank, isremove, source_type, creater, operator, createtime, operatortime
mapper.select: select car.order_no, car.order_time, car.report_time, car.car_number, car.car_frame_number, car.order_amount, car.order_status, car.client_id from car_scrap_order car where car.id = #{id}
